issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.35 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #00bdb0, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.35 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #00bdb0, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.36:1. Recommendation:  change background to #00857c.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.36:1. Recommendation:  change background to #00857c.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > main > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > a

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.36:1. Recommendation:  change background to #00857c.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.36:1. Recommendation:  change background to #00857c.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > main > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(5) > a

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #767676.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #767676.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > main > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(6) > a

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.35:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #00bdb0, surrounding text: #ffffff)
The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.35:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #00bdb0, surrounding text: #ffffff)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
